name: Ffionaâ€™s Restaurant
address: 51 Kensington Church Street, London W8 4BA, United Kingdom
author: Douglas A.
description:
What a marvelous place.  The food is excellent and Ffiona is such a gregarious and creative cook.  This is simply one of my favorites in London.  Fish and chips was delightful and the lamb superb.  Great list of sides and a varied menu featuring fresh ingredients in season.
This is a good place for family, friends, or couples.  It is on the smallish side so I recommend that you call ahead for a reservation or drop Fiona an email.
The location is Kensington with a simple storefront.  It was not too far from public transportation.
Loved talking to Fiona and her staff.  This is a gem and worth the trip to dine there.
